entries.withdraw_treasury_error: Unable to complete withdraw.  Please try again.
entries.withdraw_treasury: You must select a positive amount to withdraw from the treasury.
entries.treasury_withdraw_prompt: Enter the amount you would like to withdraw from the city treasury.  You may only withdraw between 10,000 and 50,000 credits once per day.
entries.deposit_treasury: You deposit %DI credits into the treasury.
entries.remove_militia_prefix: Are you sure you want to remove
entries.destroy_prefix: Are you sure you want to destroy
entries.more_than_cap: more civic structures than your cap of
entries.positive_deposit: You must select a positive amount to transfer to the treasury.
entries.treasury_deposit_d: Enter the amount you would like to transfer to the city treasury.
entries.destroy_city_object: Are you sure you want to destroy %DI?  The object's city DB entry will be removed and the object (if it exists) will be destroyed.
entries.destory_object: %TO has been removed from the city db and the object destroy message has been sent.
entries.city_object_list_d: A list of special city objects follows.  If an item on this list does not have a name shown, it is either unloaded or deleted.  You can select an object from the list and hit 'OK' to delete it.  Use this to clean up objects that have become destroyed but the city still thinks exist.
entries.no_special_objects: There aren't any special objects to manage.
entries.reset_shuttle_data_d: Are you sure you want to reset this city's shuttle/travel data?  You should ONLY do this if the shuttleport has disappeared for some reason, but the city still claims to have one.  You should not do this if the city already has a working shuttleport!
entries.reset_clone_data_d: Are you sure you want to reset this city's clone data?  You should ONLY do this if the clone facility has disappeared for some reason, but the city still claims to have one.  You should not do this if the city already has a clone facility!
entries.already_other_mayor: That citizen is already the mayor of some other city.
entries.not_politician: That citizen is not a politician.
entries.force_city_rank: Forcing a city rank change for city %TO.
entries.force_city_rank_d: Are you sure you want to force an immediate city rank change?  This will cause the city rank to change, but in the case of an increase your city may not have the citizens to support the new rank.  In this case the city rank will FALL the next city update.
entries.force_city_update: Forcing a city update for city %TO.
entries.force_city_election: Forcing a city update for city %TO.
entries.confirm_disable_cleanup: Do you want to disable the citizen cleanup code?  You probably want to say YES.  This cleanup code should normally only run once a week.
entries.confirm_city_update: Are you sure you want to force an immediate city update?  This will cause the city to elect a new mayor, pay maintenance, validate structures, and check to see if a new rank has been earned.
entries.force_election_only: Do you only want to force an election?
entries.mayor_citizen_restored: Restored citizenship to valid city mayor.
entries.registration_locked:
The ballot is locked during the final week of voting.
You may not register or unregister for the race at this time.
entries.unregistered_citizen_email_body: %TO has dropped from the mayoral election. All previous votes for this candidate are now disregarded and should be recast.
entries.rceb: %TO has entered the race for mayor. You can now vote for this candidate at the city voting terminal.
entries.register_timestamp: You may only register to run once within a 24 hour period.
entries.vote_abstain: You have chosen to abstain in this election.
entries.unregistered_race: You have unregistered from the mayoral race.
entries.not_registered: You aren't registered to run, so you can't unregister.
entries.city_version_update_body_3:
City Voting Rules Update

The system for electing a new mayor has changed. Voting is now held every 3 weeks. City maintainence still occurs every week. A citizen who registers to run may now unregister from the vote terminal. The mayor may unregister as well. Changes to the voting roster are only allowed during the first two weeks of each election cycle. The citizen with the most votes wins the election.

You MUST explicitly cast a vote in order to be counted. Abstentions no longer count as votes for the incumbent.

Experience point grants for winning votes have been tripled. The incumbent mayor also receives a weekly 750 point experience bonus.
entries.banned_from_that_city: You have been banned from traveling to that city by the city militia.
entries.cant_transfer_to_city_banned: You cannot transfer ownership of a structure to someone who is banned from the city in which the structure resides.
entries.city_cant_purchase_ticket:
You are banned from using the services of this city.
You cannot purchase a ticket.
entries.city_cant_board:
You are banned from using the services of this city.
You may not board the transport.
entries.set_garage_tax: The garage service fee is now %DI% of the repair cost.
entries.set_tax_d_garage: The garage tax is a service fee added to the total cost of repair for a vehicle.  If vehicle repairs would cost the owner 100cr, the total would be 110cr if the fee was 10%.  Garage tax can be between 0 and 30%.
entries.garage_fee_body: The garage usage fee for  the city of %TO has changed to %DI.
entries.not_csr_ban: You cannot ban a Customer Service Representative from the city!
entries.lost_citizen_body:
A citizen has left your city by using the revoke option on the city terminal.

Citizen Name: %TO
entries.revoke_cit_d: Are you sure you want to revoke your citizenship?
entries.lost_inactive_citizen_body:
A citizen has been removed due to six weeks inactivity.  If they return, they can rejoin the city by redeclaring at their residence.

Citizen Name: %TO
entries.shuttle_data_wiped: This city's travel data has been wiped.  You may now place a new shuttleport.
entries.clone_data_wiped: This city's clone data has been wiped.  You may now place a new clone facility.
entries.no_clone_data: There is no clone data to remove.
entries.already_warned: That player has already been warned in the last two minutes.
entries.make_mayor_d: Enter the EXACT first and last name of the character you wish to make mayor of this city.  The current mayor, if any, will be removed from office.  The person you select MUST be a citizen of the city and a politician in order to become mayor.
entries.city_expand_cap_body:
Your city %TO has qualified to increase to rank %DI.

Unfortunately, we must deny your rank and land expansion request as there are too many large cities already on the planet.

- Planetary Civic Authority
entries.busted_civic_cap_body:
Warning!

%TO has %DI more civic (city owned) structures than planetary policy allows for your city rank.  The Planetary Civic Authority is now charging your city a 75,000 credit property penalty for each structure over the cap.  Civic structures such as gardens, cloning facilities, and shuttleports contribute to this cap.  Please check the city terminal maintenance report for more information.  The penalty will be charged during your next maintenance period, unless the structures are removed.

- Planetary Civic Authority
entries.civic_count: A city of this size can only support up to %DI civic structures.
entries.cant_register_rank: Your city must be rank 3 (Township) to be registered on the planetary map.
entries.no_rank_taxes: Your city must be at least rank 2 to levy taxes.
entries.city_spec_master_manufacturing_d: An 'Industrial Society' gains the bonuses of both the 'Manufacturing Center' and 'Research Center' specializations.
entries.city_spec_master_healing_d: A 'Scientific Society' gains the bonuses of both the 'Medical Center' and 'Entertainment District' specializations.
entries.public_election_inc_body: The city elections for %TT have been held.  The incumbent Mayor is victorious!  Please congratulate Mayor %TO on retaining their office.
entries.public_election_body: The city elections for %TT have been held.  The incumbent Mayor has lost the election!  The new Mayor is citizen %TO.  Please congratulate the new Mayor!
entries.tax_sales_body: The vendor sales tax for the city of %TO has changed to %DI%.
entries.tax_income_body: The weekly citizen income tax for the city of %TO has changed to %DI credits.
entries.tax_property_body: The property maintenance tax for the city of %TO has changed to %DI%.
entries.tax_travel_body: The travel free for the city of %TO has changed to %DI credits in additon to the normal ticket price.
entries.city_invalid_body:
Warning!  Your city has fallen below the minimum count of 10 citizens.  Your city zoning permits are being reviewed by the Planetary Civic Authority.  You must have 10 or more citizens in your city within 3 days or your permits will be rejected and your city hall destroyed!

As a result of the lack of population your city has contracted to rank %DI (Outpost).
entries.lost_city_citizen_body:
A citizen has left your city.

Citizen Name: %TO
entries.no_shuttleport: You can't place a travel fee.  There is no shuttleport in this city.
entries.civic_only: You may only do that outside or in a civic structure.
entries.city_contract_body:
Warning!

The city of %TO has contracted to rank %DI due to lack of population.  Some of your civic structures may have been destroyed.  Please check the city manage terminal report menus and your email for more information.
entries.city_expand_body:
Congratulations!

The city of %TO has expanded to rank %DI!  New abilities for your city have been unlocked.  Please check the city advancement report for details.
entries.st_fail: Failed to create the skill trainer for some reason.  Try again.
entries.treasury_withdraw_body:
Attention!

Mayor %TO has made a withdrawal from the City Treasury.

Amount: %DI
Reason: %TT

- Treasury Authority
entries.withdraw_reason_d: Enter the reason for the withdraw.  The citizenship will be notified of the withdraw amount and the reason for the withdraw.
entries.withdraw_daily: You may only withdraw from the city treasury once per day.
entries.withdraw_limits: You may only withdraw between 10,000 and 50,000 credits per day.
entries.rank_info_d: The following report shows the current city rank, the current city population, the abilities of the city and the population required for the next rank.  If you have met your rank requirement, the city will advance in rank during the next city update.  Check the maintenance report for a projected time to the next update.
entries.rights_revoked_other: Your zoning rights have been revoked.
entries.rights_revoked: You have revoked their zoning rights.
entries.not_citizen_ban: You can't city ban a citizen of the city!
entries.build_no_city: You must be in a city to place that structure.
entries.maint_info_d: This report is a projection of the current maintenance costs for the city.  Maintenance is paid on a weekly basis.
entries.already_mayor: You are already the mayor of a city.  You may not be mayor of another city.
entries.grant_rights_fail: You must be the mayor of the city or a member of the city militia to grant zoning rights.
entries.zoning_d: If you enable zoning laws in your city, other players will not be able to build structures in your city without permission.  You and your militia can grant permission with the /grantZoningRights command.  This command gives the target the right to build structures in your city for 24 hours.
entries.zoning_skill: You must be a Politician to enable city zoning.
entries.zoning_disabled: Your city now has zoning disabled.
entries.zoning_enabled: Your city now has zoning enabled.
entries.unregistered: Your city is no longer registered on the planetary map.
entries.registered: Your city is now registered on the planetary map.  All civic and major commercial structures in the city are also registered and can be found with the /find command.
entries.garage_banned: You are city banned and cannot use this garage.
entries.city_warning_target: You have been warned to leave the city!  You will be attackable by the militia in 2 minutes!
entries.city_warning: %TT has been warned and will be attackable in 2 minutes.
entries.mayor_residence_change: As a city Mayor, your residence is always the city hall of the city in which you are mayor.  You cannot declare a new residence.
entries.removed_militia_target: You have been removed from the city militia.
entries.added_militia_target: You have been added to the city militia.
entries.no_factional: You must have Martial Policy IV: Faction to place faction aligned mission terminals.
entries.action_no_money: The city treasury must have %DI credits in order to perform that action.
entries.spec_time: You can't set another city spec right now.  Time Remaining: %TO
entries.null_d: The city's specialization may be removed at any time, but you won't be able to set a new specialization until the timer restriction has expired.  Are you sure you want to remove your city's specialization?
entries.spec_set: The city's specialization has been set to %TO.
entries.confirm_spec_d: \#pconstrast1 Are you sure you want to set this city specialization?\#
entries.city_spec_stronghold_d: A 'Stronghold' has trained its militia members to the peak of their abilities in the methods of tactical defense.  Militia members in a 'Stronghold' get a 50 point bonus to all defense rolls against other players.
entries.city_spec_research_d: Any experimentation done within a 'Research Center' is enhanced.  A 15% bonus to the final result roll is added during the experimentation phase of crafting.
entries.city_spec_missions_d: Missions taken in a city with an 'Improved Job Market' grant a 15% increase to their rewards.
entries.city_spec_sample_rich_d: A sample rich city has a lot of highly accessable surface resources for manual collection.  The sample rich city bestows a 20% bonus to sample sizes and a 10% bonus to extraction skill checks during resource collection using a survey tool.
entries.city_spec_industry_d: Crafting done in a 'Manufacturing Center' earns a 10% bonus to prototype assembly results, significantly reducing the chance of failures.
entries.city_spec_entertainer_d: Entertainer healing is 10% more effective in an 'Entertainment District'.
entries.city_spec_doctor_d: Medical healing is 10% more effective in a 'Medical Center'.
entries.city_spec_cloning_d: The cost of clone insurance in a city with the 'Clone Lab' specialization is reduced by 20%.
entries.city_specs_d: At rank 3, a city can select an area of specialization (spec).  A spec grants a certain set of bonuses that apply within the city borders in exchange for increased weekly maintenance.  New spec types are earned through the Politician profession.  The city's spec can only be set once per week, although it can be disabled at any time.  Select a spec from the list below to learn more about it.  When a spec is selected, the weekly city hall maintenance fee will increase by the indicated amount.
entries.no_specs: You need to learn a specialization skill before you can select one for your city.
entries.no_rank_spec: Your city must be at least rank 3 before you can set a specialization.
entries.no_skill_deco: You lack the skill to place this decoration in your city.
entries.no_more_decos: Your city can't support any more decorations at its current rank!
entries.deco_too_close: You can't place a decoration here, it would be too close to structure %TO.
entries.no_more_trainers: Your city can't support any more trainers at its current rank!
entries.trainer_d: Select a skill trainer from the list below.  The skill trainer will be placed at your current location and rotation (facing).  If you want to remove the trainer in the future, select the
option from the their radial menu.  Placing a skill trainer will cost 1000 credits, withdrawn from the treasury at the time of placement.
entries.no_more_mt: Your city can't support any more mission terminals at its current rank!
entries.mt_removed: The object has been removed from the city.
entries.job_d: Select a mission terminal type from the list below.  The mission terminal will be placed at your current location and rotation (facing).  If you want to remove the mission terminal in the future, select the
option from the terminal's radial menu.  Placing a mission terminal will cost 1000 credits, withdrawn from the treasury at the time of placement.
entries.rights_granted_self: You have granted %TO zoning rights for 24 hours.
entries.rights_granted: You have been granted zoning rights in the city of %TO for 24 hours.
entries.income_tax_nopay_mayor_body:
Mayor,

This letter is to notify you that the citizen named, %TO, failed to pay %PO income tax on time.

Civic Tax Authority
entries.income_tax_nopay_mayor_subject: Citizen Failed to Pay Income Tax
entries.income_tax_nopay_body:
Citizen %TO,

You have insufficient funds to pay your income tax of %DI credits.  While there is no direct drawback to this, the mayor has been notified of your lapse.
entries.income_tax_paid_body:
Citizen %TO,

Your income tax of %DI credits has been paid.  Thank you for your service to the city.
entries.structure_repaired_body:
Mayor %TO,

Repair work has been done on structure %TT.  You can check the structure's condition in the structure report at the City Management terminal.
entries.city_maint_body:
Mayor %TO,

A total of %DI credits has been paid from the city treasury for maintenance and upkeep of structures.
entries.structure_destroyed_maint_body:
Alert Mayor %TO!

The structure (or object) %TT was condemned and destroyed due to lack of maintenance!
entries.structure_damaged_body:
Mayor %TT,

There was insufficient money to pay for the maintenance of the structure %TO.  The amount required was %DI credits.  The structure has been damaged.  You can check the structure's condition in the structure report at the City Management terminal.
